chunks.content: # Start a run. # # When this block exits, it waits for logged data to finish uploading. # If an exception is raised, the run is marked failed. with wandb.init(entity="", project="my-project-name") as run: # Save mode inputs and hyperparameters. run.config.learning_rate = 0.01 # Run your experiment code. for epoch in range(num_epochs): # Do some training... # Log metrics over time to visualize model performance. run.log({"loss": loss}) # Upload model outputs as artifacts. run.log_artifact(model)
